attributes.additional_details:
Request for an inquiry to investigate and put a stop to the discrimination of United Kingdom Independence Party supporters.

Racism is a serious matter and should be taken seriously; the word racist describing a UKIP supporter marginalizes real problems dealing with racism in this country and the political elite should not stoop so low for their own gain.

As a UKIP supporter I am deeply concerned about being called a racist.  Lets put a stop to this smear campaign NOW before it gets out of hand.
